## browser-ui-lists package

This package is a list manager that works with the `browser-ui` renderer.

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [JsPlumbList](./browser-ui-lists.jsplumblist) | Models a list of elements that is scrollable, and connections to the elements contained in the list are proxied onto the top of bottom edge of the list element whenever their source/target is not within the list element's current viewport. |
|  [JsPlumbListManager](./browser-ui-lists.jsplumblistmanager) | Provides methods to create/destroy scrollable lists. |
